div.p:
Antonio:
Remember, in order to begin changing our behaviors and the choices we make, we have to plan. And a plan of action starts with the five key elements that weâ€™ve been discussing; One: set a date.
Two: make a public statement of intent.
Three: Identify alternatives.
Four: Plan for obstacles.
And, five: Identify support.
If we can make it through this process we have a pretty good shot of making a positive change in our lives.
